sentences.en: a burst gas main
sentences.cn: 破裂的煤气总管道

sentences.en: a summary of the main points of the agreement
sentences.cn: 协议要点的总结

sentences.en: Bordeaux is on the main Paris-Madrid line so there are frequent trains.
sentences.cn: 波尔多位于巴黎到马德里的铁路主干线上，来往列车频繁。

sentences.en: Bragg weaves together the histories of his main characters.
sentences.cn: 布拉格把他主要人物的身世都串在一起。

sentences.en: His main problem was the extremely smoky atmosphere at work.
sentences.cn: 他面临的主要问题就是：工作场所总是烟雾弥漫。

sentences.en: I’ll meet you outside the main entrance.
sentences.cn: 我在大门外等你。

sentences.en: In the main rooms red-hot radiators were left exposed.
sentences.cn: 在主室里，炽热的散热器暴露在外。

sentences.en: In the main, children are taboo in the workplace.
sentences.cn: 工作场所基本上禁止儿童进入。

sentences.en: It criticises the main contractor for seriously erring in its original estimates.
sentences.cn: 它批评主要承包商在其最初估价中犯了严重的错误。

sentences.en: On South Main Street, a huge brick building looms into view.
sentences.cn: 在南大街上，一座巨大的砖砌建筑赫然出现在人们的视线中。

sentences.en: One of his main themes is the dissimilarity between parents and children.
sentences.cn: 他的主题之一就是父母和孩子的不同之处。

sentences.en: Our main concern is that the children are safe.
sentences.cn: 我们最关心的是保证孩子们的安全。

sentences.en: The heater will run off mains gas or bottled gas.
sentences.cn: 热水器使用管道煤气或罐装煤气均可。

sentences.en: the main aim of the meeting
sentences.cn: 会议的要旨

sentences.en: The main attractions of the Big Apple are well documented.
sentences.cn: 对纽约的主要旅游胜地有详细的记载。

sentences.en: the main bedroom
sentences.cn: 主卧室

sentences.en: The main building was also used for the enactment of mystery plays.
sentences.cn: 主楼还用于神秘剧的演出。

sentences.en: The main investor in the project is the French bank Credit National.
sentences.cn: 该项目的主要投资商是法国的国民信贷银行。

sentences.en: The main reason for living in Spain is the weather.
sentences.cn: 居住在西班牙的主要原因是天气。

sentences.en: The main road continues towards Viterbo before turning right to Bolsena.
sentences.cn: 大路一直延伸到维泰博，之后右转通向博尔塞纳。

sentences.en: The report found that many of Yorkshire’s water mains needed replacing.
sentences.cn: 报告中说约克郡的很多自来水总管道需要更换。

sentences.en: The study links the main living area to the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 书房把主要的生活区与厨房连在一起。

sentences.en: There were two main political groupings pressing for independence.
sentences.cn: 有两大主要的政治团体要求独立。

sentences.en: They used a lorry to ram the main gate.
sentences.cn: 他们用卡车猛撞大门。

sentences.en: What do you consider to be the main problem?
sentences.cn: 你认为最主要的问题是什么？

words.tran_cn: 主要动力；（钟表）主发条；主要原因；主要动机
支柱；中流砥柱；主要的依靠；主桅支索
主要部分，要点；体力；[材]总管道

phrases.tran_cn: 主体，主要部分；主船体；机身
主要特征；主要特点；主景；功能特点
主要部分，主体；主要零件

trans.tran_en: larger or more important than all other things, ideas etc of the same kind

trans.tran_cn: 主管道，水源，（水等）供应系统
trans.tran_en: gas, water, or electricity supplied to a building through a pipe or wire
